ygData.subject: Re: Web sites / demon stuff / this and that
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone have a screenshot of what a player equipped with the demon claw looks like in-game?  I am curious as to what Verant did with the Freddy Kreuger
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone have a screenshot of what a player equipped with the demon claw
looks like in-game? I am curious as to what Verant did with the "Freddy
Kreuger" type weapon, i.e. does it just appear as a dagger, etc?

I gave up a long time ago caring about the fact that my hand drum looks like
a flute, but I certainly hope that we get some major graphical improvements
somewhere along the line to correct some of the quirks like these that we
experience.

I saw one the other day when I bought some cheapo little throwing daggers
and equipped them in my range attack slot...I was holding a Shiney Brass
Shield (PENDING LORE BTW) and a Combine LS and when I put the tiny daggers
in Range attack my Shield and Sword disappeared from my external camera view
(F9) and it looked like I was just holding a dagger.

I was grouped with a ranger about a week ago in the Oasis and for some
reason the graphic for his Banded Coif was not showing up even though it was
equipped on him - I actually thought that was kind of neat, getting to have
the armor but not having to see it, especially since I am not all that fond
of the banded graphical interpretation on Half-Elves like myself.

Faras of Qeynos
Half-Elf Bard
E'ci Server
